SELECT question_no questionNo, Lecture_no lectureNo, account_id accountId, question_writer questionWriter, question_title questionTitle, question_content questionContent, question_createdate questionCreateDate, question_updatedate questionUpdateDate, question_count questionCount, question_password questionPassword FROM question WHERE question_no=#{questionNo} ORDER BY account_id DESC LIMIT #{beginRow},#{rowPerPage}
